strAddFriend:
So you are the chosen undead. A pleasure to meet you. Sage Frampt has spoken to me about you. I am Oscar of Astora. 
欢迎选择{strSelfName}的免费掷骰服务！
.help协议 确认服务协议
.help指令 查看指令列表
.help设定 确认骰娘设定
.help链接 查看源码文档
使用服务默认已经同意服务协议
strAddGroup:
A pleasure to meet you. Sage Frampt has spoken to me about you. I am Oscar of Astora.

strCriticalSuccess: 大成功！That's a wonderful thing. I only wish that I had such a purpose.
strDismiss: I will be fine. You ought to focus on yourself.
strDismissPrivate: 如果讨厌我的话，何必如此麻烦？
strExtremeSuccess: 极难成功！You and I, we're both Undead. May we each fulfil our respective purposes.
strHlpMsg:
欢迎使用奥斯卡。
请使用.dismiss QQ号（或后四位） 使{self}退群退讨论组
.bot on/off QQ号（或后四位） //开启或关闭指令
.help协议 确认服务协议
.help指令 查看指令列表
.help群管 查看群管指令
.help设定 确认骰娘设定
.help链接 查看源码文档
官方论坛: https://forum.kokona.tech/
论坛导航贴: https://kokona.tech
青果扩充核心文档:https://oliva.dicer.wiki/
strNumCannotBeZero: 你并非无理智的游魂，为什么要给我无意义的数字？
strRollCriticalSuccess: 大成功！That's a wonderful thing. I only wish that I had such a purpose.
strRollDice: {pc}看见骑士递出了手中的骰子: {res}
strRollExtremeSuccess: 极难成功。Very well. Let us keep our wits about us.
strRollFailure: Yes, I see... No matter. May we meet again. I pray for your success.
strRollFumble: 大失败…Yes, I see… Perhaps I was too hopeful… Hah hah…
strRollHardSuccess: 困难成功！Things appear to have settled. I was right to partner with you.
strWelcomePrivate: 我想我们之间不需要这些寒暄。
